meanings.definition: To exceed in weight or importance
meanings.sent1: The elephant outweighing the mouse in size was a funny sight.
meanings.sent2: The benefits of exercise outweighing the risks is a common belief.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a feather outweighing a rock in a wrestling match is amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outweighing any material possessions is a beautiful metaphor.
meanings.sent5: The impact of his words outweighing any other arguments was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: To be more significant or influential than something else
meanings.sent1: His passion for the project outweighing his lack of experience was inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The positive feedback outweighing the negative comments boosted her confidence.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a small ant outweighing a giant in a debate is amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outweighing any obstacles was like a shining beacon.
meanings.sent5: The joy of their reunion outweighing the time apart was heartwarming.
